timeline.bodyText: Imho these should be renamed to getUploaderUrl(), getUploaderName(), and getUploaderAvatarUrl() to be consistent with the other Extractors.

timeline.bodyText: Just return "Comments" like in PeerTube (and YouTube in my Page PR), as that function is just pointless. Maybe even do that in CommentsExtractor directly and remove the function from all the comments extractors.
